name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish with aromatic spices, basmati rice, and choice of meat or vegetables.

name: Samosa
description: Deep-fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled chunks of marinated paneer cheese served with mint chutney.

name: Dosa
description: Thin, crispy pancake made from fermented rice and urad dal batter, typically served with coconut chutney.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Fried bread paired with spicy chickpea curry.
